Package bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SequencePullStreamer
    Object that work on sequences.
    SequenceReader
    An Object that reads sequences as String.
    SequenceStreamer
    Object that streams a series of sequences one by one.
    SequenceWriter
    Object able to write a sequence in a file given the id and the sequence.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppTest
    Unit test for simple App.
    FastaFileDereplicator
    Main class that delete redundant sequences from one or multiple sequences files.
    FastaSequenceWriter
    Writer able to write a sequence and ad id into a file respecting the fasta format.
    FilePointerContainer
    Utility object that store a RandomAccessFile and a list of pointers.
    FrequencyPullStreamer
    Object that store each sequence in a frequency table using a FilePointerContainer for each file.
    FrequencyTableWriter  
    RandomFastaSequenceStreamer
    Object that streams a Fasta sequence file and call the SequencePullStreamer.pull(String, Object...) method every time that it finds a sequence.
    SequencePointerPullStreamer  
    SequencePullStreamerDecorator
    Decorator class for SequencePullStreamer implementations.
    SimpleSequencePullStreamer  
    UniFire
